subject: Re: A shipment from order EE-44059 is on the way
raw_subject: Re: A shipment from order EE-44059 is on the way
description:
Dear Customer service team,

I noticed that FedX didn't have an estimated delivery date for me yet. Do you happen to have any further insight on when my order (EE-44059) will arrive to me? Just checking because I will be out of town for a few days next week and didn't want to miss the delivery of my order. Please let me know. This way your team and I can coordinate the best possible solution if a delivery issue does come up.

Much appreciated!

Thanks,
Jack Root
206-601-5401
